description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3051 Junior Slim Fit Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and hook & bar fastening. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
two side pockets
tailored waistband with belt loops
hook and bar fastening
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose
Click here for our symbols glossary

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Lynton pinafore offers both style and functionality to your child’s uniform, with a novelty charm on the zip to add a playful touch. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Lynton is an essential uniform staple all year round.
pleated pinafore
novelty charm on zip
fully lined bodice
Fabric & care

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.

The Monkhouse Stick-on Name Tapes feature black personalised lettering on pre-cut white iron-on name tapes. The labels are ideal for naming uniform and sportswear. description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Boys Long Sleeve Shirt is a practical and stylish choice for an everyday essential, offering both comfort and durability. The shirts come in a handy twin pack so you can be stocked up and prepared for the school year ahead!
button to neck
non-iron
chest pocket
new! easy fasten closure to size 12.5" collar and below
internal packaging and poly bags are made from 100% recycled sources and can be recycled after use

65% recycled polyester
35% cotton

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Girls Trimley Slim Fit trousers are built for durability and comfort - lasting through the rigours of school life and providing fantastic value for money. These stylish and smart trousers have a contemporary slim cut and include a waist adjuster for the perfect fit.
slimfit
internal waist adjuster
two mock front pockets
functional back pocket
front fastening
sits low on the waist for a comfortable fit
new improved fit
Fabric & care
63% recycled polyester
33% biodegradable viscose
4% elastane

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Girls Trimley Slim Fit trousers are built for durability and comfort - lasting through the rigours of school life and providing fantastic value for money. These stylish and smart trousers have a contemporary slim cut and include a waist adjuster for the perfect fit.
slimfit
internal waist adjuster
two mock front pockets
functional back pocket
front fastening
sits low on the waist for a comfortable fit
new improved fit

33% biodegradable viscose

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Girls Long Sleeve Blouse is a practical and stylish choice for an everyday essential, offering both comfort and durability. The blouses come in a handy twin pack so you can be stocked up and prepared for the school year ahead!

slim fit styling
button to neck
narrow placket

The Banner Boys Long Sleeve Shirt is a practical and stylish choice for an everyday essential, offering both comfort and durability. The shirts come in a handy twin pack so you can be stocked up and prepared for the school year ahead!
button to neck
non-iron
chest pocket
new! easy fasten closure to size 12.5" collar and below
internal packaging and poly bags are made from 100% recycled sources and can be recycled after use
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton
Click here for our symbols glossary
description_icon_alts: ['Eco Product Icon', 'Slim Fit Icon', 'Non Iron Icon', 'Twinpack Icon', 'Tumble Dry Icon', 'Sustainable Cotton Icon']

The Monkhouse Stick-on Name Tapes feature black personalised lettering on pre-cut white iron-on name tapes. The labels are ideal for naming uniform and sportswear. Simply place the label on your garment and press down with your iron. If the garment cannot be ironed, the label can be sewn on. Personalise your labels with your child’s name in the box below.

Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3051 Junior Slim Fit Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and hook & bar fastening. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
two side pockets
tailored waistband with belt loops
hook and bar fastening
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets

slim fit

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.
button front corded gingham dress

pointed revere collar
taped neck seam

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Boys Long Sleeve Shirt is a practical and stylish choice for an everyday essential, offering both comfort and durability. The shirts come in a handy twin pack so you can be stocked up and prepared for the school year ahead!
button to neck
non-iron
chest pocket
new! easy fasten closure to size 12.5" collar and below
internal packaging and poly bags are made from 100% recycled sources and can be recycled after use
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton

The Banner Boys Long Sleeve Shirt is a practical and stylish choice for an everyday essential, offering both comfort and durability. The shirts come in a handy twin pack so you can be stocked up and prepared for the school year ahead!
button to neck
non-iron
chest pocket
new! easy fasten closure to size 12.5" collar and below
internal packaging and poly bags are made from 100% recycled sources and can be recycled after use
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton
Click here for our symbols glossary

The Monkhouse Stick-on Name Tapes feature black personalised lettering on pre-cut white iron-on name tapes. The labels are ideal for naming uniform and sportswear. Simply place the label on your garment and press down with your iron. If the garment cannot be ironed, the label can be sewn on. Personalise your labels with your child’s name in the box below.

Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3051 Junior Slim Fit Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and hook & bar fastening. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
two side pockets
tailored waistband with belt loops
hook and bar fastening
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Girls Trimley Slim Fit trousers are built for durability and comfort - lasting through the rigours of school life and providing fantastic value for money. These stylish and smart trousers have a contemporary slim cut and include a waist adjuster for the perfect fit.
slimfit
internal waist adjuster
two mock front pockets
functional back pocket
front fastening
sits low on the waist for a comfortable fit
new improved fit
Fabric & care
63% recycled polyester
33% biodegradable viscose
4% elastane
Click here for our symbols glossary

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Girls Trimley Slim Fit trousers are built for durability and comfort - lasting through the rigours of school life and providing fantastic value for money. These stylish and smart trousers have a contemporary slim cut and include a waist adjuster for the perfect fit.
slimfit
internal waist adjuster
two mock front pockets
functional back pocket
front fastening
sits low on the waist for a comfortable fit
new improved fit
Fabric & care
63% recycled polyester
33% biodegradable viscose
4% elastane
Click here for our symbols glossary

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets

slim fit

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Junior Banbury Deep Waist Skirt offers a traditional pleated style, ideal for every season. The elasticated back and pull-on design provide extra comfort throughout the school day.

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.
button front corded gingham dress
contrast white trim on sleeves and pockets
tie belt at back
pointed revere collar
taped neck seam
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton

The Monkhouse Stick-on Name Tapes feature black personalised lettering on pre-cut white iron-on name tapes. The labels are ideal for naming uniform and sportswear. Simply place the label on your garment and press down with your iron. If the garment cannot be ironed, the label can be sewn on. Personalise your labels with your child’s name in the box below.
pre-cut white tapes
iron-on and sew application
black personalised lettering

The Banner Bermuda Shorts provide fantastic value for money with the durability to last the rigours of school life. These long legged shorts offer a contemporary style, ideal for comfort in those warmer months.
fully lined short
long leg style
pleated front with elasticated back
belt loops
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% biodegradable viscose
Click here for our symbols glossary

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose
Click here for our symbols glossary

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.
button front corded gingham dress
contrast white trim on sleeves and pockets
tie belt at back
pointed revere collar
taped neck seam
Fabric & care

Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.
button front corded gingham dress
contrast white trim on sleeves and pockets
tie belt at back
pointed revere collar
taped neck seam
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose
Click here for our symbols glossary

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.
button front corded gingham dress
contrast white trim on sleeves and pockets
tie belt at back
pointed revere collar
taped neck seam
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose
Click here for our symbols glossary

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Girls Long Sleeve Blouse is a practical and stylish choice for an everyday essential, offering both comfort and durability. The blouses come in a handy twin pack so you can be stocked up and prepared for the school year ahead!
internal modesty buttons
slim fit styling
button to neck
narrow placket
back seams
new! easy fasten closure to size 26" chest and below
internal packaging and poly bags are made from 100% recycled sources and can be recycled after use
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.
button front corded gingham dress
contrast white trim on sleeves and pockets
tie belt at back
pointed revere collar
taped neck seam
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton
Click here for our symbols glossary

Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3051 Junior Slim Fit Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and hook & bar fastening. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
two side pockets
tailored waistband with belt loops
hook and bar fastening
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care

The Banner Junior Banbury Deep Waist Skirt offers a traditional pleated style, ideal for every season. The elasticated back and pull-on design provide extra comfort throughout the school day.

deep yoke

Fabric & care

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Lynton is an essential uniform staple all year round.

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Bermuda Shorts provide fantastic value for money with the durability to last the rigours of school life. These long legged shorts offer a contemporary style, ideal for comfort in those warmer months.
fully lined short
long leg style
pleated front with elasticated back
belt loops
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% biodegradable viscose

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose
Click here for our symbols glossary

The Lynton pinafore offers both style and functionality to your child’s uniform, with a novelty charm on the zip to add a playful touch. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Lynton is an essential uniform staple all year round.
pleated pinafore
novelty charm on zip
fully lined bodice
Fabric & care
100% recycled polyester

description:
As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.
button front corded gingham dress
contrast white trim on sleeves and pockets
tie belt at back
pointed revere collar
taped neck seam
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% cotton

Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose

Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.

slim fit

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Banner Bermuda Shorts provide fantastic value for money with the durability to last the rigours of school life. These long legged shorts offer a contemporary style, ideal for comfort in those warmer months.
fully lined short
long leg style
pleated front with elasticated back
belt loops
Fabric & care
65% recycled polyester
35% biodegradable viscose
Click here for our symbols glossary

description:
Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. Established in 1976, Zeco has always supplied the very best in quality, hard wearing schoolwear garments. The Zeco BT3048 Pull-On Trouser is optimised for comfort throughout the school day with an elasticated back and pull-on design. This uniform essential provides a smart look with a slim fit design and tailored front waistband.
flat front with elasticated back waist
mock fly and two side pockets
tailored front waistband
slim fit
stain resistant teflon ecoelite℠ finish
Fabric & care
65%polyester 35% viscose

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Lynton is an essential uniform staple all year round.

As the UK’s largest and leading schoolwear supplier, Banner is passionate about making every student look and feel great by producing sustainable and affordable quality schoolwear. The Ayr Gingham Summer Dress offers a classic style perfect for those warmer months. Designed with durability and comfort in mind, the Ayr easily lasts the rigours of both classroom and playground activities.

description:
